mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.prj_num AS "prjNum", a.prj_name AS "prjName", a.build_corp_name AS "buildCorpName", a.build_corp_code AS "buildCorpCode", a.prj_address AS "prjAddress", a.contact AS "contact", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tproject( prj_num, prj_name, build_corp_name, build_corp_code, prj_address, contact, mobile, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{prjNum}, #{prjName}, #{buildCorpName}, #{buildCorpCode}, #{prjAddress}, #{contact}, #{mobile}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tproject SET prj_num = #{prjNum}, prj_name = #{prjName}, build_corp_name = #{buildCorpName}, build_corp_code = #{buildCorpCode}, prj_address = #{prjAddress}, contact = #{contact}, mobile = #{mobile}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
